name: Oxygen Regulator
specifications: Brass and steel construction; includes pressure gauge, flowmeter, and adjusting knob; designed to attach to an oxygen cylinder.
function: Controls the flow rate and delivery of oxygen from a cylinder to the patient via tubing or mask.
usage: Wear gloves; attach regulator securely to oxygen cylinder; open valve slowly; adjust flow rate as prescribed and confirm pressure on the gauge.
maintenance: Check for leaks; clean gauge surfaces; avoid using damaged or corroded regulators.
warning: Setting incorrect flow rate or forcing the regulator onto the cylinder, which can cause equipment damage or injury.
